data.actual_result: The image is rotated 90 degrees to the left. After uploading the processed one the "original" will also switch orientation
data.expected_result: The image should be in the orientation it was taken in
data.short_description: Portrait photos taken on portrait orientation on the Google Pixel 2 (XL) appear sideways in Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Wait for the image to process - Optional: View the image in other apps to confirm it's not sideways - Upload to Discord
